thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Chipotle restaurant sales rise slightly after price increases

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chipotle restaurant sales rise slightly after price increases
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc on Tuesday reported a slightly better-than-expected rise in sales at established restaurants, boosted by menu price increases, as it works to regain customer trust after food safety lapses in 2015.
Sales at Chipotle restaurants open at least 13 months were up 0.9 percent for the fourth quarter. Analysts, on average, had expected a gain of 0.7 percent, according to Consensus Metrix.
Reporting by Lisa Baertlein in Los Angeles; Editing by Susan Thomas
